review permissions

Protect your accounts in a few minutes, and a few clicks.

  1. Review the permissions granted to services that have access to your accounts.
  2. Revoke the permissions of services you don't recognize or don't use.
  3. Check off the services you have reviewed.
GitHub Hosting service for software development. docs review
SoundCloud Music and audio streaming platform. review
Tumblr Microblogging platform. review
Twitter Social networking. review

Contribute to this project on GitHub.

Built with <3 by @koenrh.
